author: barnabasbusa
content: Hey EL teams, could we get an update from you how EOF coming along?

author: marekm3498
content: <@412614104222531604> we (Nethermind) have an implementation of all EIPs and we're verifying it. However, the biggest problem with EOF is the lack of tests now. We're discussing it on the EVM channel. What is more, the spec is changing a bit
